long_description: The Gerber Bear Grylls Scout knife is designed with scouting in mind. It draws on Bear's experience as a Chief UK Scout and figurehead to millions of Scouts worldwide. Partially-serrated blade is made of high carbon stainless steel that offers great edge retention and rope-cutting ability. Dual-sided thumb stud allows easy opening with either hand. Ergonomic, textured-rubber grip maximizes comfort and minimizes slippage. Lock Back feature locks the blade securely in place when open and enhances safety when closing. Sturdy clip makes it easy to carry the knife on a pocket, belt or waistband. The Gerber Bear Grylls Scout knife comes with the.
short_description: The Gerber Bear Grylls Scout knife is designed with scouting in mind. It draws on Bear's experience as a Chief UK Scout and figurehead to millions of Scouts worldwide.
